testcase.name: Create and verify a new user
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the OrangeHRM login page......................................passed When I login with valid credentials.........................................passed Then I should be redirected to the dashboard................................passed Given I navigate to Admin User Management page..............................passed When I create a new user with the following details:........................passed Then the user should be created successfully................................passed When I search for the user by username "testuser_<timestamp>"...............passed Then the user should appear in the Records Found table......................passed And the user details should be correct......................................passed
